# loops

**Article**

A Boolean value indicating whether the group loops.

## Overview

The default value is `false`, in which the group executes its actions [doc://com.apple.usd/documentation/USD/performcount] number of times and then stops.

When `true` and [doc://com.apple.usd/documentation/USD/type] is `serial`, the group restarts its action sequence with the first action after the last action completes. When [doc://com.apple.usd/documentation/USD/type] is `parallel`, the runtime repeats each action independently.

### Declaration

```other
uniform bool loops = false
```

## Properties

- **info:id**: The action’s unique identifier.
- **type**: An option that controls the order in which the actions execute.
- **performCount**: A value that specifies the number of times the group’s actions repeat.
- **actions**: A list of actions that make up the group.
